summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5270 for the improvement of Gilman Place West, from 26th Avenue West on the south to 26th Avenue West on the north; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 60944, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
